item.title: The Vision
item.description:
The Vision

Watch the Full Video We live in an age where endless entertainment options exist at our fingertips, yet we still have a real need to get out of the house and share new experiences with our friends and family. At THE VOID you will walk into new dimensions and experience worlds without limits.

item.title: A Platform-Thinking Approach to Innovation
item.description:
A Platform-Thinking Approach to Innovation

Innovation is about solving customer problems. It's been claimed that innovation is about beating the competition or about maximizing shareholder returns but if the successes (and failures) of the past decade are anything to go by, the primary goal of innovation is solving customer problems. There are three broad approaches to problem solving that innovators...

item.title: The Virtual Reality Renaissance: How Learning in VR Will Inspire Action Like Never Before - Singularity HUB
item.description:
The Virtual Reality Renaissance: How Learning in VR Will Inspire Action Like Never Before - Singularity HUB

6,287 5 Humanity is standing on a precipice. We have never been closer to achieving a world where everyone has the ability to live and thrive. Biotech, nanotech and AI promise to reshape the world and have the potential to imbue humanity with near-godlike powers.

item.title: I've Seen the Future - and It's Incredible
item.description:
I've Seen the Future - and It's Incredible

The Dimension One experience is only 5 mins long and starts with stepping through a portal into an Aztec- like temple and ends with fleeing from a perilously dangerous room, and being sucked (depressingly) back into reality.
